content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -13.5, 20.0) and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5)

### Pipe network
Consists of the following entities:
- PipeGroup for steam (position -18.5, 16.5)
- PipeGroup for water (position -12.5, 21.5)
- Multiple pipes connecting the steam engine and boiler

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of a lab (position -17.5, 23.5) that requires automation science packs to start research.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure there are no obstructions between the steam engine at position (-18.5, 19.5) and boiler at position (-13.5, 20.0) before attempting to connect pipes.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
